tool.name: Group Sequences
tool.description: group sequences according to user queries

param.name: center_around
param.help: Center around which residue? This will occur for the first time this residue is seen in a given sequence
param.label: center_around

param.name: number_before
param.help: How many resiudes before the target should be considered?
param.label: number_before

tool.help:
DESCRIPTION ===========
Given a set of fasta sequences, this tool will group them acording to the first time it encounters a set of N residues which it should ``center_around``. All the sequences with that cluster of amino acids are then reported
